title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin shares who gets all the blame after the Broncos shocking loss to the Seahawks to start the season. He criticizes Seahawks fans for booing Russell Wilson in his return to Seattle for the first time. He gives you his top 10 NFL teams after week 1 of the NFL season. Plus, 10-time Pro Bowler Joe Thomas joins the show to discuss the Steelers upset win over the Bengals. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
